description: McKay-Thompson series of class 12H for Monster.
links: D. Ford, J. McKay and S. P. Norton, More on replicable functions, Commun. Algebra 22, No. 13, 5175-5193 (1994).
Index entries for McKay-Thompson series for Monster simple group
formula: Given g.f. A(x), then B(x) = A(x)+4 satisfies 0 = f(B(x), B(x^2)) where f(u, v) = -u*v*(1 + u^2*v^2) + 7*u*v*(u + v)*(1 + u*v) + 9*u*v*(u^2 + v^2). - _Michael Somos_, May 16 2004Expansion of (eta(q^3) * eta(q^4) / (eta(q) * eta(q^12)))^4 - 4 in powers of q. - _Michael Somos_, May 16 2004
mathematica: QP = QPochhammer; s = (QP[q^3]*(QP[q^4]/(QP[q]*QP[q^12])))^4 - 4*q + O[q]^40; CoefficientList[s, q] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Nov 13 2015, adapted from PARI *)
prog: (PARI) {a(n) = local(A); if( n<-1, 0, n++; A = x * O(x^n); polcoeff( (eta(x^3 + A) * eta(x^4 + A) / (eta(x + A) * eta(x^12 + A)))^4 - 4*x, n))}; /* _Michael Somos_, May 16 2004 */(PARI) {a(n) = local(A); if( n<-1, 0, n++; A = x * O(x^n); polcoeff( eta(x^2 + A)^6 * eta(x^6 + A)^6 / (eta(x + A)^5 * eta(x^3 + A) * eta(x^4 + A) * eta(x^12 + A)^5) - 5*x, n))}; /* _Michael Somos_, May 16 2004 */
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 27 2000
